result.title: Need help with 510D (Fox and Jumping)
result.content: Hi all. I've been trying some bitmask+DP problems lately, and I've found one that is a little too challenging for me: 510D - Лиса и прыжки. I looked at the editorial, and the first thing they tell us is that the problem reduces to finding a set of lengths such that GCD is 1 and has minimal cost. Would anyone be so kind to explain how this works? Thanks in advance.
